permissions: Admins can delete any objective. Non-admins can delete non-template objectives only if they are practically a manager of the objective organization. Deleting templates requires admin privileges.
side_effects: Deletes the objective and its dependent records, including child objectives, key results, objective stakeholder classifications, and objective changes; also deletes posts where the objective is the creator. Deletion is blocked when dependent templated objectives exist.
validation_notes: Requires an objective ID argument. --confirm is required. Deletion fails if the objective has dependent templated objectives (restrict_with_error).
